perturbation.original_text: "Bank Rules" means the Bank Card Merchant Rules and Regulations provided to Sublicensed Customer in writing, as amended from time to time, which are incorporated into this Agreement by reference. 1
perturbation.changed_text: "Bank Rules" means guidelines provided to Sublicensed Customer as amended from time to time. 1
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specific mention of 'Bank Card Merchant Rules and Regulations' and stating they are incorporated, the definition becomes vague. Later sections referring to 'Bank Rules' will lack a precise meaning, creating uncertainty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text:
The Company represents, warrants, and covenants to Allscripts that, during the term of this Agreement and any Customer Agreement:

(a) when used in accordance with the Documentation, all Subscription Software Services or Merchant Processing Services and the Installed Software as provided by the Company will meet, in all material respects, all applicable specifications set forth in this Agreement and the Documentation, and function in all material respects, in conformity with this Agreement and the Documentation;

(b) any media on which the Installed Software or Documentation is delivered will be free of any damage or defect in design, material or workmanship; and

(c) no Update will have a material adverse effect on the material functionality or operability of the Installed Software or Subscription Software Services or Merchant Processing Services, as the case may be.
perturbation.changed_text:
The Company represents, warrants, and covenants to Allscripts that, during the term of this Agreement and any Customer Agreement:

(a) when used in accordance with the Documentation, all Subscription Software Services or Merchant Processing Services and the Installed Software as provided by the Company will function in conformity with this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Removing specific mentions of 'applicable specifications set forth in this Agreement and the Documentation' creates a contradiction. While section 21.3 now requires conformity, the basis for determining conformity is less clear. This makes it more difficult to prove a breach of warranty.

perturbation.original_text: The initial Allscripts relationship contact is [***] and the initial Company relationship contact is [***]. Each Party may change its respective relationship contact at any time upon written notice to the other Party.
perturbation.changed_text: The initial Allscripts relationship contact is [***]. Each Party may change its respective relationship contact at any time.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the company contact info while Section 7.2 still states 'In the event of any issues that may arise pursuant to this Agreement, the Parties' relationship contacts may confer to resolve such issues,' creates a contradiction and makes it impossible for Allscripts to follow through on this clause in good faith.
